about_the_game:
Show your support for Tavern Talk with our Supporter Edition Upgrade!

  • Get six exclusive bonus tracks from Tavern Talk's original soundtrack composed by the incredibly talented Filippo Beck Peccoz—including the wonderful song "Calling on the Wind" with Lilith Max.

  • Get the short story "A Study in Fairy Dust", where the young detective Melina—one of our favorite characters—is the main protagonist.

  • Get two awesome wallpapers for mobile & desktop.

To access this content please proceed as follows:

  • Right-click on the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".

  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select "Browse...".

  • Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.
